channel.title: Posts on My Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on My Blog

item.title: Programming is Magic and I am a Magician
item.description: We programmers appear as one thing to those shrouded from the mysteries of writing code and present as another entirely to those engulfed in technical prowess.

item.title: Find Majority of Elements in a String using PHP
item.description: Let’s imagine that we have a string with an arbitrary number of characters.

item.title: How to Preserve Object Order from PHP to Javascript
item.description: In PHP we use an array as both a vector and a hashmap (or dict).

item.title: How to Strip HTML Tags but Keep their Text
item.description: Let’s consider the following problem. We have some HTML which comes from user-input.

item.title: How to Parse Words in PHP
item.description: The idea of parsing words in natural human language is not as simple as it appears to be.

item.title: How to Create ASCII Tables in PHP
item.description: Creating a table of rows and columns in ASCII where each column may need resized as the data in each cell changes can be painful.

item.title: How to write a Self Replicating Worm in PHP
item.description: Self replicating code is a fun coding exercise to flex the old brain muscle.
